text: James Carroll "T" Jones (January 10, 1931 – September 15, 2020) was an American football player, coach and athletic director. He was the starting quarterback of the Texas Longhorns in 1951–52. He was the athletic director at Texas Tech University from 1985 to 1993. Jones was born in Childress, Texas. Jones died on September 15, 2020 in Horseshoe Bay, Texas at the age of 89.Longhorn Legend and college athletics icon “T” Jones passes away ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: James "T" Jones
